title: Roveer's Storehouse
content:
the Basement.

Roveer's Storehouse Rewards

Roveer's Storehouse Notes & Tips

You can talk to the cats in the kitchen, however they refuse to help you catch the rats. Emperor's hideout is right next to the basement. But be careful the githyankis are already there waiting to ambush you.
